lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: How did God show the Israelites where to go?
answers: A pillar of cloud by day, a pillar of fire by night
He didn't show them where to go

questions.text: What did God say Pharaoh would do?
answers: Change his mind and chase them

questions.text: When the Israelites left, what did Pharaoh do?
answers: Sent his army to chase after them

questions.text: Where did God lead the Israelites to?
When they saw the army coming, what did the Israelites say?
answers: Did you bring us here to die in the desert?
God will save us right away

questions.text: What did Moses say to the people when they were afraid?
answers: Be still, God will fight for you
Run away as fast as you can

questions.text: What did God do when Moses held out his staff?
answers: God sent a wind to part the waters in two
God caused the sea to freeze
God floated the people into the air

questions.text: What was it like as the Israelites walked across the Red Sea?
answers: Walls of water on each side, the ground was dry
The water was shallow and muddy
The people walked on top of the water

questions.text: As the Egyptians chased the Israelites, how did God slow them?
answers: They panicked and their chariot wheels jammed

questions.text: When Moses held up his staff again, what happened?
answers: The water came down onto the Egyptian army
